dct_title_s: A new and accurate map of the Empire of the Great Mogul, together with India on both sides the Ganges and the adjacent countries
dct_description_sm: Map of India and Indochina with relief shown pictorially. Prime meridian: London. Plate 43 from: A complete atlas, or, Distinct view of the known world / by Emanuel Bowen. London : Printed for William Innys and Joseph Richardson [and others], 1752.
Ames Library of South Asia Maps
dct_publisher_sm: Printed for William Innys and Joseph Richardson ... et al.; London
dcat_keyword_sm: South Asia Maps Early Works to 1800
